name: Falling Down (PikaStars)
description:
Autumn’s finally here, and you just want to relax at home. However, your favorite coffee shop is closed, and you need the energy to stay awake. You decided to go on an adventure out in the wild to find some coffee and regain your energy. No need to rush, though~ take your time and enjoy all the factors that define autumn!

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, R to restart,  enter and shift to make platforms invisible/visible
